body:
How do I change the process name of an Erlang VM?  

It isn't very convenient to have `beam` listed when I do `ps -A`...

Somewhat related to: [http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2255444/changing-the-process-name-of-a-python-script](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2255444/changing-the-process-name-of-a-python-script)
title: How do I change the process name of an Erlang VM?
